description: Provides one or more conformance packs deployment status.

parameters.name: ConformancePackNames
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of conformance pack names. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ConformancePackArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of comformance pack.

nested_items.name: ConformancePackState
nested_items.description: Indicates deployment status of conformance pack.
CREATE_IN_PROGRESS when a conformance pack creation is in progress for an account.
CREATE_COMPLETE when a conformance pack has been successfully created in your account.
CREATE_FAILED when a conformance pack creation failed in your account.
DELETE_IN_PROGRESS when a conformance pack deletion is in progress.
DELETE_FAILED when a conformance pack deletion failed in your account.

nested_items.name: StackArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of CloudFormation stack.

nested_items.name: ConformancePackStatusReason
nested_items.description: The reason of conformance pack creation failure.

nested_items.name: LastUpdateRequestedTime
nested_items.description: Last time when conformation pack creation and update was requested.

nested_items.name: LastUpdateCompletedTime
nested_items.description: Last time when conformation pack creation and update was successful.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The nextToken string returned in a previous request that you use to request the next page of results in a paginated response.
